kesako.utilities

Class XMLUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • kesako.utilities.XMLUtilities

  • public class XMLUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    XML utilities.
    The class implements the Log4J logging system.
    Author:
    Frederic SACHOT

      • getNode

        public static org.w3c.dom.Node getNode(org.w3c.dom.Node parent,
                       java.lang.String nodeName)
        Return a Node object with the name is nodeName
        Parameters:
        parent - parent Node which contains the node nodeName
        nodeName - name of the node
        Returns:
        a Node object with the name is nodeName
        if the node parent doesn't have child nodes, null is return.

      • updateNodeXML

        public static void updateNodeXML(org.w3c.dom.Node parentXML,
                 java.lang.String nodeName,
                 java.lang.String value)
        Update the value of a XML node
        Parameters:
        parentXML - parent node of the node for which the value has changed
        nodeName - name of the node for which the value has changed
        value - new value of the node.
